name: ASCII Game Series: Beginning
description:
Enjoy the long forgotten pong-like minimalistic retro game with relaxing music.

It is a retro arcade game featuring simple two-dimensional ASCII graphics. The game was inspired originally games of 80's.

The game consists of a ball bouncing on a screen. A platform is controlled from a mouse or keyboard allowing user to make the ball bounce back up.


There is only one rule: don't let the ball leave your screen!Features:
  • classic game concept
  • retro ASCII graphic style
  • ambient music
  • 5000 Steam achievements
